title: Rhapsody of Fire-Visions From The Enchanted Lands (VIDEO_TS)
description:
Rhapsody of Fire-Visions From The Enchanted Lands (VIDEO_TS)  Time 195 min

Ten years went by since the world had its first encounter with Rhapsody (Of Fire) by means of the debut album "Legendary Tales". The Italian band got more fans 
worldwide with every album and could realize some of their dreams. That's why they gradually yet resolutely developed their contemporary unique style, which is 
generally labelled as film score metal.

It was about high time for a DVD and it even turned out to be a double one. We all know: if Rhapsody does something, they do it well. "Visions From The 
Enchanted Lands" indeed is a larger than life fantastic document, something to lick one's chops over and over again. DVD 1 includes a majority of live material. 
From the very outset, images and sound are so overwhelming that it seems as if you are at the first row of a true Rhapsody In Fire concert. Many registrations are 
coming from the "Demons, Dragons And Warriors Tour" in 2005 throughout North America and Canada. Now they offer you the views of the earlier released 
double CD "Live In Canada 2005 - The Dark Secret", but there are some live registrations from Germany and Czech Republic as well. On top of that we have two 
previously unreleased songs (audio only) on this disc, plus two videos.

DVD 2 is more focused on "behind the scenes" material (while even on DVD 1 we had fragments with fans and the band members too). Videos and stories about 
the making of are intermittent with a live song again and explanations about the live equipment (what a good-looking guitar Luca Turilli has!!!) are followed by 
interesting things worth knowing about Christopher Lee, the orchestra, and of course their label-mates Manowar and the management with who they have close 
contact. That's why we even can have a look into Manowar's studio and a rehearsal. No need to say that you are busy with all this for quite a while, but it is truly 
worthwhile to purchase this amazing double DVD!

Tracklist:
DVD 01:
Unholy Warcry (introduction)
The Past Few Years
The Wisdom Of The Kings (Live from Germany)
The Fans
The Village Of Dwarves (Live from Canada)
The Mystical Journey
Erian's Mystical Rhymes (Live from Canada)
Drum Solo (Live from Canada)
Canadian Cousins
Dawn Of Victory (Live from Canada)
Lamento Eroico (Live from Canada)
Emerald Sword (Live from Canada)
Czech Republic "Masters of Rock":
The Village Of Dwarves
Land Of Immortals
Germany's Earthshaker Fest 2005:
Holy Thunderforce
Bonus Videos:
Unholy Warcry - music video (extended version)
The Magic of the Wizard's Dream (German Version)
Unreleased bonus tracks (audio only):
Age Of The Red Moon
Power Of Thy Sword

DVD 02:
Unholy Warcry - music video
The Magic Of The Wizard's Dream - music video
The Making of The Dark Secret - documentary
The Making of The Wizard's Dream - documentary
Unholy Warcry (Live from USA)
Live Equipment
Additional Interviews from 2005 Tour
Triumph Or Agony - Electronic Press Kit
Rehearsal - Erian's Mystical Rhymes
The Village Of Dwarves
Outtakes
Unholy Warcry - music video (Behind The Scenes)

Line-up/Musicians

Luca Turilli - guitars
Alex Staropoli - keys
Alex Holzwarth - drums
Fabio Lione - vocals
Patrice Guers - bass
Dominique Leurquin - guitar

Guest musicians:
Christopher Lee - vocals
Manuel Staropoli - flute
